en.title: Electronic Arrival Card
en.subtitle: Mandatory digital registration for all travelers

sections.title: What Changed?
sections.content: Since November 20, 2025, China has fully adopted an online arrival card system, replacing traditional paper forms. Note: Airports still retain kiosks and paper forms as backups, but digital is preferred.

sections.title: Who Needs It?
sections.content:
Required for all foreign travelers entering China, including those on visa-free entry or transit. 

Exemptions include:
• Holders of China Permanent Residence ID
• Hong Kong/Macau residents with Home Return Permits
• Group Visa holders
• 24-hour direct transit passengers not leaving the port restriction area
• Crew members arriving/departing on the same vessel

sections.title: When & How to Fill
sections.content:
• Timing: Recommended to complete 24-72 hours before arrival.
• Official Channels: NIA Official Website, 'Immigration 12367' APP, or 'Arrival Card' miniprogram on WeChat/Alipay.
• Process: Fill personal info, passport, flight, address in China -> Submit -> Save the generated QR Code.

sections.title: Entry Inspection
sections.content:
Upon arriving at the immigration counter, present the QR code and your passport. 

Pro Tip: Screenshot the QR code. Airport Wi-Fi can be spotty, and you don't want to be stuck loading the page.

sections.title: Required Information
sections.content: Ensure your Personal Info matches your passport exactly. You will need your flight number, detailed address in China (Hotel or Residence), and intended dates.

zh.title: 电子入境卡
zh.subtitle: 所有入境旅客必须完成的数字申报

sections.title: 政策更新
sections.content: 自2025年11月20日起，中国全面启用在线填写入境卡系统，取代传统的纸质表格。（机场仍保留自助终端和纸质表格作为备用）。

sections.title: 适用对象
sections.content:
除特定豁免人群外，所有入境的外国旅客（包括免签和过境旅客）都必须填写。

豁免人群包括：
• 持中国永久居留证者
• 持回乡证的港澳居民
• 持团签者
• 24小时直接过境且不离开口岸限定区域的旅客
• 随原船出入境的船员等

sections.title: 填写时间与方式
sections.content:
• 建议时间：抵达前 24至72小时 在线填写。
• 官方渠道：国家移民管理局（NIA）官网、“移民局12367”APP、或微信/支付宝搜索“入境卡”小程序。
• 流程：填写个人信息、护照号、航班号、在华住址及联系方式 → 提交 → 保存生成的二维码 (QR Code)。

sections.title: 入境查验
sections.content: 抵达移民检查柜台时，需出示该二维码及护照。建议截图保存二维码，以免机场Wi-Fi连接不畅导致无法加载。

sections.title: 填写内容
sections.content: 个人基本信息（需与护照一致）、往返日期、航班号、在华详细住址（酒店或私人住宅）、旅行目的等。

sections.title: Current Status
sections.content: Strict pandemic 'Health Codes' are gone, but the Customs Health Declaration is still required for all entry/exit.

sections.title: How to Declare
sections.content:
• Use WeChat or Alipay to search for 'Customs Pocket Declaration' (海关旅客指尖服务), or use the web version.
• Timing: Must be filled within 24 hours of entry/exit.

sections.title: The 'Black Code'
sections.content:
After submission, you will get a QR code (commonly called the Black Code). 
• Validity: 24 Hours only.
• Usage: Single use. 
• Important: Take a screenshot immediately.

sections.title: Quarantine & Testing
sections.content:
• PCR tests are NO longer required before boarding.
• Embassy health codes are NO longer checked.
• On-site antigen testing may be requested if you declare symptoms (fever, etc.) or if the declaration is abnormal.

sections.title: 当前状态
sections.content: 虽然疫情期间严格的“健康码”已取消，但入境人员仍需完成海关健康申报。

sections.title: 操作流程
sections.content:
• 通过微信或支付宝搜索“海关旅客指尖服务” (Customs Pocket Declaration) 小程序，或使用网页版。
• 申报时间：必须在出入境前24小时内填写。

sections.title: 凭证（黑码）
sections.content:
提交后会生成一个健康申报码（通常称为黑码）。
• 有效期：24小时内有效。
• 使用限制：单次使用。
• 提示：务必截图保存。

sections.title: 检疫要求
sections.content:
• 不再强制要求登机前进行核酸检测（PCR）。
• 不再查验使馆健康码。
• 如果申报异常或在口岸出现发热等症状，可能会被要求进行抗原检测。

sections.title: The 24-Hour Rule
sections.content: Chinese law requires all foreigners to register their accommodation with the Public Security Bureau (police) within 24 hours of arrival.

sections.title: staying in Hotels
sections.content:
If you stay in a hotel with a license to host foreigners:
• The hotel front desk will complete this registration for you automatically upon check-in.
• You do not need to do anything extra, but ensure the hotel is 'authorized for foreign guests' before booking.

sections.title: Private Residences & Airbnb
sections.content:
If staying with friends/family or in a private rental:
• You (or the host) MUST register at the local police station within 24 hours.
• Online Systems: Cities like Beijing, Shanghai, and Shenzhen have launched self-service online systems (e.g., 'Beijing Public Security' WeChat, 'Overseas Personnel Accommodation Registration'). You can upload passport/visa photos to generate an electronic receipt without visiting the station.

sections.title: Consequences
sections.content: Failure to register can result in a fine of up to 2000 RMB. More importantly, it can negatively impact future visa applications or entry into China.

zh.title: 住宿登记
zh.subtitle: 抵达后24小时内的重要法律义务

sections.title: 24小时规定
sections.content: 中国法律规定，外国人在中国境内住宿必须在24小时内向公安机关申报登记。

sections.title: 酒店住宿
sections.content:
如果入住持有涉外接待资质的酒店：
• 前台会在办理入住时自动通过系统完成登记，游客无需额外操作。
• 建议预订时确认酒店是否“可接待外宾”。

sections.title: 民宿/私宅
sections.content:
如果住在亲友家中或通过Airbnb等平台预订的民宿：
• 游客或房主必须在抵达后24小时内向当地派出所申报。
• 在线申报：北京、上海、深圳等一线城市已推出在线自助申报系统（如“北京公安出入境”公众号、“境外人员住宿登记自助申报系统”），无需亲自前往派出所，上传护照和签证页即可生成电子回执。

sections.title: 后果
sections.content: 未按规定登记可能面临最高2000元人民币的罚款，并可能影响未来的签证申请或入境。

en.title: Flights & Tickets
en.subtitle: Navigating Transit Rules and Domestic Travel

sections.title: Transit Visa-Free (144/240h) Rules
sections.content:
• Confirmed Ticket: You MUST hold a confirmed seat on a connecting ticket to a third country/region (Country C).
• A-B-C Principle: Your itinerary must be Country A (Origin) -> Country B (China) -> Country C (3rd Country). 
• Examples:
  - Allowed: USA -> Shanghai -> Hong Kong
  - Allowed: USA -> Beijing -> Japan
  - NOT Allowed: USA -> Shanghai -> USA (Round trip is NOT transit).

sections.title: Pre-flight Checks
sections.content: Airlines will verify your onward ticket to Country C at your departure point. If you only have a one-way ticket into China without proof of exit to a third country, you may be denied boarding.

sections.title: Regular Entry / 30-Day Visa Free
sections.content: It is highly recommended to have a return or onward ticket. Immigration officers may ask to see proof of your intended departure.

sections.title: Domestic Travel in China
sections.content:
• Real-Name System: China's High-Speed Rail (12306) and flights require strict ID checks.
• Booking: Foreigners can use Trip.com (easiest) or the 12306 English App (requires manual passport verification, takes time).
• Station Entry: Use the Manual Channel (staffed counter) or new Passport-Scanning Gates where available.

zh.title: 航班与机票
zh.subtitle: 过境免签规则与国内交通指南

sections.title: 过境免签 (144/240小时) 特殊要求
sections.content:
• 联程客票：必须持有已确定日期和座位的联程机票（或船票、列车票），前往第三国或地区。
• A-B-C 原则：行程必须是 A国（出发地）→ B区（中国）→ C国（第三国/地区）。
  - 允许：美国 → 上海 → 香港；美国 → 北京 → 日本。
  - 不允许：美国 → 上海 → 美国（即往返行程不适用过境免签）。

sections.title: 事前查验
sections.content: 在出发地登机时，航空公司会检查旅客是否持有前往第三国的联程机票。如果只有单程入境机票而无离境证明，可能会被拒绝登机。

sections.title: 普通入境/30天免签
sections.content: 建议持有返程或离境机票证明，边检可能会要求出示以确认行程。

sections.title: 国内段交通
sections.content:
• 实名制：中国的高铁（12306）和飞机实名制严格。
• 预订：外国游客可通过 Trip.com 预订，或下载 12306 英文版 APP（需人工核验护照，耗时较长）。
• 进站：进站时走人工通道或使用支持护照识别的自助闸机。
